original: Åkerskog, Simon Vilhelm, fil. mag., Göteborg, f. 26/5/08- i Vartofta-Åsaka, Skarab. 1. G. m. Carrie Ramfelt. Barn: Bengt f. 36, Gunnar 40, Christer 43. — Stud :ex. i Jönköp. 27, fil. kand. i Upps. 31, fil. mag. 33’, provår v. Gbgs h. real 38-39. Timlär. i Vetlanda 34, e. o. lär. i Sunne 34-36, e. o. lär. o. vik. v. Gbgs h. folksk. (prakt, mellansk.) 36-36, ^e. o. 36-38 o. 39-40, ord. ämnesiär. där sed. 41, timlär. v. Gbgs östra real 39, assist, i fysik v. CTH 39 o. 41 o. sed. 46. Löjtn. i Int:-kår. res. 43.
translated: Åkerskog, Simon Vilhelm, BA, Gothenburg, b. 26/5/08 in Vartofta-Åsaka, Skarab. 1. Married to Carrie Ramfelt. Children: Bengt b. 1936, Gunnar b. 1940, Christer b. 1943. -- Examined: Jönköping 1927, BA Uppsala 1931, MA 1933. Internship at Gothenburg High School 1938-1939. Hourly teacher in Vetlanda 1934, substitute teacher in Sunne 1934-1936, substitute teacher and temporary teacher at Gothenburg primary school (practical, middle school) 1936-1938 and 1939-1940, regular subject teacher there since 1941. Hourly teacher at Gothenburg East High School 1939, assistant in physics at CTH 1939 and 1941 and since 1946. Lieutenant in the Intelligence Corps reserve 1943.
